author: 0xprivatechaos
content: Hi everyone! I'm excited to be joining EPF permissionlessly. Looking forward to contributing to and deepening my understanding of Ethereum core technologies!

author: mariohavel
content:
Welcome to Cohort 6 <@&857649635274915900>! 

The fellowship officially starts today and we are setting of on our 5 month long journey. I am excited to be here again with a group of talented fellows who plan to dedicate themselves to work on the core of Ethereum <:eth2:595693639913570305> ðŸš€ 

Join us today at 3PM UTC (<t:1750086000:t> in your timezone) for the kick-off call. We will present details about the program, upcoming weeks, provide guidelines and instructions for participation.

It's also a first opportunity to meet other fellows so feel free to use your camera and say hi! It will be recorded but best to attend if you have any further questions, we will also answer all your questions.

Join us in couple of hours at:
https://meet.ethereum.org/epf-standup

author: mariohavel
content:
<@&857649635274915900>  The kick-off call is starting <t:1750086000:R>! 

Come to get ready take your first steps in the fellowship https://meet.ethereum.org/epf-standup
